skills.name: HEX
desc: • Deals magical damage to a single target.
• 30% Chance to Lower MAGIC of enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: MIRE
desc: • Deal magic damage to all enemies.
• 25% Chance to Increase MAGIC for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt increases the higher target’s ATK stat is.

skills.name: DEFLECT
desc: • Reflects 35% of damage back to the target..
